puzzles.name: Shadow Word
puzzles.description: Angle the three candles so their shadows spell the hidden word.

puzzles.name: Blink Code
puzzles.description: Match the lantern flashes and press the numbered buttons in the same order.

puzzles.name: Portrait Swap
puzzles.description: Swap the two portraits until the plaques sit in birth-year order.

puzzles.name: Haunted Reflection
puzzles.description: Three mirrors show different scenes; pick the one that still moves in the dark.

puzzles.name: Ashen Count
puzzles.description: Brush away the soot to reveal the numbers that unlock the cellar latch.

puzzles.name: Echoed Name
puzzles.description: Listen to the chapel chant and write the final word the spirits repeat.

hints.hintText: Count the flashes before you touch the numbered buttons.
Birth years march forward—make the portraits follow.
Only one mirror shows anything that moves.
Count the ash marks from left to right to hear the lock click.
The whisper keeps repeating the final word of the chant.
